hspage.title: How to build a music collection

pagecontent.p: When you first open musicGuru, your collection is empty. So filling it up is the first thing you need to do.

ol.li: In the file chooser that will pop up, find the directory containing your music.
If you don't like the default location name, type another one. You can't have 2 locations with the same name.
Click on Next and wait until the process is finished.

pagecontent.p: If you have CDs or DVDs containing music files, do the following for each of your CD.

ol.li: Insert your CD in the drive.
Make sure your CD is currently selected in the list. There might be other removable medias present.
If you don't like the default location name, type another one. You can't have 2 locations with the same name.
Click on Next and wait until the process is finished.
Do the same for all your CDs
